turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a Starbucks drink, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande caffè mocha, no whipped cream, with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so a grande cafe mocha, no whipped cream and 2% milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, then it's going to be from the 123 Main Street location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 123 main street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. I really appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
